# init()

**Initializer**

Creates the configuration of a provider object.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating New Configurations

- **init(localizedName:)**: Initializes a configuration with the specified localized name.

items.description: Initializes a configuration with the specified localized name.
